root.name: 007: Racing
root.description: Mission StructureThe mission structures that appear throughout the game consist of racing against an opponent, racing against the clock, racing to an objective, or all three combined.VehiclesMost of the vehicles are inspired by the movies and novels. They consist of:Lotus EspritBMW Z3BMW Z8BMZ 750iLAston Martin DB5GadgetsLike the vehicles, the gadgets were inspired by the novels and the films. Some examples of these include a rocket launcher, smoke screen, machine guns, shields, and more.
